title: wine_Kooyong_2012_Estate_Pinot_Noir_(Mornington_Peninsula)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 89263.
country: Australia.
description: Like many Mornington producers, Kooyong has a relatively short track record (founded 1996). For much of that time, winemaking was under the guidance of Sandro Mosele, including this stunning 2012. It shows Burgundian levels of complexity in its array of smoke, leather, root vegetable and black cherry notes, then backs that all up with a firm-yet-supple texture and tremendous length. Drink now through 2022..
designation: Estate.
points: 93.
price: 55.0.
province: Victoria.
region_1: Mornington Peninsula.
